name: VVV (GuyMakesStuff)
description:
VVV Is An Endless Topdown Shooter Made For The Brackeys Game jam 2021.2 Where You Survive Against Hordes Of Incoming Enemies For As Long As You Can While Gaining Score By Killing Them!

I Really Hope I Made The Game Enough Chaotic Because I Really Did  Not Have An Idea For The Theme So I Just Made The Game Chaotic(Get It?, I Let There Be Chaos?).

Gameplay


Secret Pro Tip: NEVER Go Near The Edges Of The Screen!

V
